item.title: 巴里克将向马里支付 4.3 亿美元以解决金矿争端
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，巴里克矿业公司已同意与马里达成 2,440 亿非洲法郎（约合 4.3 亿美元）的和解协议，作为结束长达两年的纠纷的协议的一部分。【原文：Barrick Mining Corp. has agreed to a 244 billion CFA francs ($430 million) settlement with Mali, as part of a deal to end a two-year dispute that shuttered one of the company’s most important gold operations, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 台积电对英特尔前高管提起商业机密诉讼
item.description: 台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. says it filed a lawsuit against a former executive who joined Intel Corp.】

item.title: 周大福因黄金税改影响未达预期
item.description: 周大福珠宝集团有限公司（Chow Tai Fook Jewellery Group Ltd.）报告称，在更广泛的经济逆风中，该公司的利润略低于预期，因为在中国取消长期存在的黄金退税后，该公司对长期前景的担忧与日俱增。【原文：Chow Tai Fook Jewellery Group Ltd. reported slightly weaker-than-expected profits amid broader economic headwinds, as concerns grew about its longer-term outlook following China’s removal of a long-standing tax rebate on gold.】

item.title: 捷豹路虎母公司认为廉价技术将推动印度电动汽车销售
item.description: 塔塔汽车乘用车有限公司（Tata Motors Passenger Vehicles Ltd.）的一位高管表示，随着新企业的加入以及技术成本的下降使电池驱动汽车的价格更加合理，印度的电动汽车市场有望实现快速增长。【原文：India’s electric vehicle market is poised for rapid growth as new players enter and falling technology costs make battery-powered cars more affordable, said a top executive at Tata Motors Passenger Vehicles Ltd.】

item.title: 估值 40 亿美元后，Sword 首席执行官称 IPO 暂时 "无聊
item.description: Sword Health 公司 41 岁的创始人毫不讳言自己的雄心壮志—；或者说，他对走传统的上市之路并不感兴趣。【原文：Sword Health’s 41-year-old founder isn’t shy about his ambitions — or his lack of interest in taking the conventional path to the public markets.】

item.title: 丹麦房价飙升令央行警惕稳定性问题
item.description: 丹麦中央银行警告说，丹麦首都飙升的房价有可能蔓延到该国其他地区，威胁金融稳定。【原文：Soaring house prices in Denmark’s capital risk spilling over to the rest of the country and threatening financial stability, the nation’s central bank warned.】

item.title: 贝恩支持的公司将在 20 亿美元大宗交易中出售 Kioxia 股票
item.description: 贝恩资本（Bain Capital）支持的一家实体将在大宗交易中抛售 Kioxia Holdings Corp. 的股份，因为该公司自一年前首次公开募股以来股价一路飙升。【原文：A Bain Capital-backed entity will dump a stake in Kioxia Holdings Corp. in a block trade as the stock has surged since its initial public offering about a year ago.】

item.title: 部长称马来西亚陆军基金将削减在阿芬公司的股份至 9
item.description: 马来西亚国防部长穆罕默德-哈立德-诺丁（Mohamed Khaled Nordin）表示，马来西亚武装部队养老基金将把其在阿芬银行有限公司（Affin Bank Bhd）的持股比例降至 9%，因为该基金寻求减持战略资产，并将收益投资于固定收益。【原文：Malaysia’s Armed Forces Pension Fund will reduce its stake in Affin Bank Bhd. to 9% as it seeks to reduce holdings in strategic assets and invest the proceeds in fixed income, Defense Minister Mohamed Khaled Nordin said.】

item.title: 卡塔尔电信股票销售燃起股市复苏希望
item.description: 卡塔尔是中东地区股票销售最冷清的市场之一，该国的一次规模可观的后续股票发行激起了人们对多哈证券交易所活动回暖的一丝希望。【原文：A sizable follow-on equity offering in Qatar, one of the Middle East’s quietest markets for share sales, is stirring tentative hopes for a pickup in activity on Doha’s bourse.】

item.title: 印度银行考虑为不受制裁的俄罗斯石油贸易提供融资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，如果俄罗斯石油的交易量来自非黑名单上的卖家，并且交易符合制裁规定，印度的银行现在愿意考虑为俄罗斯石油贸易提供融资。【原文：Banks in India are now willing to consider financing trade in Russian oil if volumes come from non-blacklisted sellers and transactions are sanctions-compliant, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 交易员为英国预算动荡避险，英镑波动性飙升
item.description: 在周三的英国预算案公布之前，针对英镑波动的保护成本已飙升至七个月来的最高点。【原文：The cost of protection against swings in sterling has surged to a seven-month high before Wednesday’s UK budget.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行发现非洲和亚洲跨境交易流量激增
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）南非分部负责人表示，随着跨境交易流量的回升以及非洲大陆最大经济体出现复苏迹象，巴克莱银行在非洲的投资和私人银行业务的交易渠道十分畅通。【原文：Barclays Plc has a strong pipeline of deals across its investment and private-banking businesses in Africa as cross-border deal flow picks up and the continent’s largest economy shows signs of recovery, the head of its South African unit said.】

item.title: 剑桥大学考虑至少出售 10 亿美元与卫生部门相关的债券
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，JD.com 公司正寻求通过出售与股票挂钩的债券来筹集至少 10 亿美元的资金，这将是中国电子商务公司近期债务发行浪潮中的最新一笔。【原文：JD.com Inc. is looking to raise at least $1 billion through an equity-linked bond sale, according to people familiar with the matter, in what would be the latest in a wave of recent debt offerings by Chinese e-commerce companies.】

item.title: 金边债券迎来 2020 年以来最佳涨势，却遭遇预算现实考验
item.description: 自冠状病毒大流行以来收益最好的英国债券持有者正准备等待政府发布一项税收和支出计划，该计划可能会影响他们今年的收益。【原文：UK bondholders sitting on the best returns since the coronavirus pandemic are preparing for the government to release a tax-and-spend plan that could make or break their year.】

item.title: 非洲顶级服装零售商 Pepkor 准备在银行设立分支机构
item.description: 百事可乐控股有限公司（Pepkor Holdings Ltd.）获得南非当局批准，在南非设立银行业务，这家非洲大陆最大的预付费服装和手机销售商正努力为其数百万低收入客户提供更多金融服务。【原文：Pepkor Holdings Ltd. got approval from South African authorities to establish a banking presence there as the continent’s biggest seller of clothing and mobile phones using prepaid seeks to offer its millions of lower-income customers more financial services.】

item.title: 开发商万科人民币债券暴跌，债务担忧加剧
item.description: 随着投资者对这家陷入困境的房地产公司偿还债务能力的担忧与日俱增，中国万科公司的部分人民币债券出现了近一年来的最大单日跌幅。【原文：Some of China Vanke Co.’s yuan bonds plunged in their biggest daily drop in nearly a year, as investor worries grow about the distressed property firm’s ability to repay debt.】

item.title: 出口和家庭支出是德国经济停滞的罪魁祸首
item.description: 贸易和私人消费是德国第三季度经济停滞的罪魁祸首，在此期间，欧盟与美国达成了关税协议。【原文：Trade and private consumption were to blame for Germany’s third-quarter stagnation, a period that saw the European Union enter into a tariff agreement with the US.】

item.title: 阿尔-戈尔投资公司从加拿大皇家银行和 Achmea 募集 2 亿美元资金
item.description: 阿尔-戈尔（Al Gore）的世代投资管理公司（Generation Investment Management）成立的一家合资企业吸引了 2 亿美元的新资金，用于一项旨在恢复因耕作和砍伐森林而退化的土地的战略。【原文：A venture set up by Al Gore’s Generation Investment Management has attracted $200 million in new money for a strategy that targets the restoration of land degraded by farming and deforestation.】

item.title: 富达国际和 Amundi 至少看到两次欧洲央行降息
item.description: 一些欧洲最大的资产管理公司表示，市场低估了欧洲央行进一步降息的可能性。【原文：Some of Europe’s biggest asset managers say the market is underestimating the probability of additional interest-rate cuts from the European Central Bank.】

item.title: 贝莱德寻求再用一年时间部署亚洲私人信贷基金
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）正寻求延长其第二支亚洲私人信贷基金的投资期限，并修改战略中的一项关键条款，这是该公司试图驾驭该地区私人市场时出现复杂化的最新迹象。【原文：BlackRock Inc. is seeking to extend the investment horizon of its second Asia private credit fund and revise a key clause in the strategy, in the latest sign of complications as it tries to navigate the region’s private markets.】

item.title: 印度 Zetwerk 公司计划首次公开募股 7.5 亿美元，聘请六家银行
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度合同制造商 Zetwerk Pvt 公司正准备申请首次公开募股，募集资金可能高达 7.5 亿美元。【原文：Zetwerk Pvt, an Indian contract manufacturer, is preparing to file for an initial public offering that may raise as much as $750 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英国股市将下滑，英镑维持在 1.31 美元左右
Stegra 股东日立能源排除为初创公司提供新现金的可能性
item.description: 电气设备供应商日立能源有限公司（Hitachi Energy Ltd.）不会再向瑞典初创公司 Stegra AB 投入更多资金，该公司最初于 2022 年收购了这个绿色钢铁项目。【原文：Electrical equipment supplier Hitachi Energy Ltd. won’t put more money into Swedish startup Stegra AB, having originally bought into the green steel project in 2022.】

item.title: 伊朗海上石油库存创 23 年以来新高，中国需求滞后
item.description: 海上油轮上的伊朗原油数量已增至两年半以来的最高水平，这反映出尽管欧佩克成员国的出口量仍在增加，但第一大买家中国的需求却在放缓。【原文：The amount of Iranian crude held on tankers at sea has swelled to the highest in two-and-a-half years, reflecting slower demand from top buyer China even as exports from the OPEC member remain elevated.】

item.title: 荷兰银行新任首席执行官寻求在重大改革中裁员 5,200 人
item.description: 随着新任首席执行官玛格丽特-贝拉尔德（Marguerite Berard）努力提高盈利能力，荷兰银行计划削减 5200 个全职岗位。【原文：ABN Amro Bank NV plans to cut 5,200 full-time roles as new Chief Executive Officer Marguerite Berard seeks to boost profitability.】

item.title: 小米创始人斥资 1300 万美元购股引发股价反弹
item.description: 小米公司创始人雷军购买了价值约 1 亿港元（1290 万美元）的公司股票，这可能有助于提振这家智能手机制造商的情绪，此前该公司股价从 7 月份的最高点暴跌了 30% 以上。【原文：Xiaomi Corp. founder Lei Jun’s purchase of about HK$100 million ($12.9 million) worth of company stock may help bolster sentiment in the smartphone maker after shares tumbled more than 30% from its July peak.】

item.title: 人民币长期套期保值成本自 2011 年以来首次持平
item.description: 一项显示人民币升值或贬值对冲成本的期权市场指标14年多来首次转为中性。【原文：An options market gauge showing the cost to hedge against declines or advances in the yuan has turned neutral for the first time in more than 14 years.】

item.title: 比特币交易员发现抛售有缓解迹象，代币趋于稳定
item.description: 最近几周对比特币造成沉重打击的抛售压力似乎正在缓解，这让人们希望比特币的暴跌即将结束。【原文：The intense selling pressure that has weighed on Bitcoin in recent weeks looks to be easing, raising hopes that the token’s brutal slide is nearing an end.】

item.title: 英国绿党的民粹主义倾向漠视市场，令城市担忧
item.description: 绿党领袖扎克-波兰斯基（Zack Polanski）承诺向富人征税并放开借贷，将资金投入到英国濒临崩溃的公共服务领域，从而赢得了选民的支持。他提出的消除不平等的主张令经济学家们感到震惊。【原文：Green Party leader Zack Polanski is winning over voters with his pledge to tax the wealthy and unleash borrowing to plow money into Britain’s ailing public services. His inequality-busting ideas are alarming economists.】

item.title: 欧洲汽车销量持续攀升，汽车制造商纷纷推出经济型电动汽车
item.description: 10 月份，欧洲汽车销量连续第四个月攀升，原因是该地区的汽车制造商继续推出价格更低廉的电气化车型。【原文：European car sales climbed for a fourth straight month in October, as the region’s automakers continue to push out more affordable electrified models.】
